note.p: French naturalist and museum director. Completed a degree in natural science, Lyon, 1876. Travelled in South America for the museum of Lyon, 1877–8. Teacher, agricultural school, Ecully, 1880–2; Société d’enseignement professionnel du Rhône, 1881–5. Director, natural history museum of Grenoble, 1887–1919.
Personal communication from the Museum d’histoire naturelle, Grenoble.
